unnormalised: Folks, get ready to rev your engines! This week has been a launchpad for new vehicles, from family cars to rugged SUVs. Mahindra unveiled its 'Scorpio N' facelift in Nashik, boasting a sunroof bigger than your average Mumbai apartment (probably around 400 sq ft!).

Royal Enfield also teased a new adventure bike inspired by Ladakh trips. Rumor has it, it can handle Khardung La pass with ease! More details next week. Stay tuned for updates, and drive safe, yaars!
